name: Neil Degrasse Tyson Funks the Universe
description: I edited NDT's appearance on the Rogan Podcast to Wax Taylor, and animated this music video that appeared in several media publications.

name: The Age of Surprise
description: I wrote and animated this video for the U.S. Air Force to present to Congress in a seminar about funding needed for cyber security.

name: The Space Report
description: I produced this animation for the Space Foundation to introduce the 2015 Space Report.

name: Defense Intelligence Agency
description: I animated the first minute and 40 seconds of this video for the Defense Intelligence Agency.

name: National Defense University
description: I worked on the animations for this video to introduce Hillary Clinton's 2013 Patriot Award.

name: History of Facebook
description: I produced this animation for a freelance client to break down the history of Facebook.

name: Animation Demo Reel
description: I worked on the animations for this video to introduce Hillary Clinton's 2013 Patriot Award.

name: X-Energy Nuclear Reactor
description: I created animations for this video explaining X-Energy's innovative nuclear reactor concept.
